task: Fix BYE heats - Remove scores and display BYE text

steps.description: Update WEC25BracketData.tsx to remove scores from BYE heats (1-11, 15-16, 20) and set score1/score2 to null
steps.test: Verify BYE heats have null scores in bracket data

steps.description: Update bracket display components to show 'BYE' text instead of scores for heats with null scores
steps.test: Verify BYE text displays correctly in UI

steps.description: Verify database matches for BYE heats have correct status (PENDING) and no scores
steps.test: Query database to confirm no scores exist for BYE heats

steps.description: Check heats that advance from BYE heats (17, 22, 25) have correct scores
steps.test: Verify scores for advancing heats are correct
